alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 1:41AM MST until February 24 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts in the upper Cottonwoods. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 2 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
